complaint.description: I am still getting robot calls about an account that is not mine
complaint.suggestion: Resolve the issue and stop the unwanted calls

meta.review_title: Vodacom shrugs their shoulders for customer. Unwanted calls
meta.review_content: Vodacom you should not even be able to get one star, when is my problem going to get sorted out? I am still getting your robot calls about an account that is not mine after assuring me it has been sorted out on the previous review I have posted here.
